Module mesakit.graph.core
Package com.telenav.mesakit.graph

Class RouteBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.mesakit.graph.RouteBuilder
public class RouteBuilder extends Object
Builds a route by adding edges to the ends before calling route() to build the Route.

Adding Edges

  • append(Edge)
  • append(Route)
  • prepend(Edge)
  • prepend(Route)
  • canAppend(Edge)
  • canAppend(Route)
  • safeAppend(Edge)
  • safeAppend(Route)
  • smartAdd(Edge)
  • safeSmartAdd(Edge)
  • safeSmartAdd(Route)

Building a Route

  • route()
  • isValid()
  • length()
  • size()
